activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#8629
activity.text: @AdityaJ2305 It seems like you've made some partial changes. When you're clearing the input text, it should not remove the selected values from the dropdown. Instead, it should only clear the input field. This is the desired behavior from the user's perspective. Could you please adjust this accordingly?
